segments.text: Hey, are you ready for this?
Let's get started.
I've got a mini-story for you that's a little strange, super funny, and maybe even a bit silly.
Don't worry about anything. Just relax and enjoy the ride.
No need to think about grammar right now.
Seriously, forget about it.
All you have to do is listen and let the story sink in.
If you hear a word or phrase you don't understand, no problem.
You can pause, look it up, and keep going.
The important thing is to feel the story and have fun with it.
So, are you ready to jump in?
Let's start!
There was a beautiful woman named Sophie.
Sophie had to play Tiger Woods in golf in just one month.
So Sophie went to Japan to find a golf coach.
She found a coach called Yoda.
He said,
I can help you learn golf, Sophie.
He said,
If you use your subconscious, you will become a golf master.
So Sophie tried to use her subconscious.
She closed her eyes every time she played golf.
Yoda said,
Use your subconscious. Close your eyes.
Unfortunately, it didn't work.
Every time she hit the ball, it went into the trees.
So Sophie went to Hawaii.
So Sophie went to Hawaii and she found a coach named Farley.
He wasn't a golf coach. He was a surf coach.
He said,
If you practice golf and surf every day, you will always succeed.
She did it and she failed.
Now she was very worried.
Only one more week to play Tiger Woods.
She went to San Diego to find another coach.
She went to Tony Robbins.
Tony Robbins was a peak performance coach.
Sophie said,
Help me, Tony. Help me.
Tony said,
If you engage your physiology, you will be a master.
She was in a peak emotional state.
A top emotional state.
She felt top, great, wonderful, best.
Then Tony said,
Now practice golf.
She improved very quickly.
Finally, the day came.
Sophie played Tiger Woods.
Tiger was very tired.
He looked very tired.
But Sophie was in a peak emotional state during the whole game.
Finally, at the end of the game, Sophie won.
She beat Tiger Woods.
Tiger cried,
Sophie, you're the best now.
He wrote a check to Sophie for $85 million.
Tiger cried and cried.
He was very sad.
